entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
